titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for preventing of disorders in the night-time, in the garrison of Oxford
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, this third of February, in the one and twentieth yeare of our reigne. 1645."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
